data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Lahore, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jat (Hindu traditions) people.
Spirit, please defend the 26,983 believers in Lahore against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Lahore who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Lahore
location.people_groups_list: Rajput Manj, Rajput Chauhan (Muslim traditions), Qassab, Rajput Garewal (Muslim traditions), Rajput Bhatti (Muslim traditions)
